TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_bayi, title = bayi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/bayi} }

S.FORM: alang bayi ga niya mki sku Nanto Keng atu Nin'ay go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 30 buwan, 92 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 90% kyan ku 83 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 10% kyan ku 9 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 83%, Setik 3%, Bunun 3%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na bayi hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na bayi hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na bayi hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na bayi hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na bayi hya' ga Knaziy. tay 'llaw na bayi hya' ga Malepa. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang bayi ga niya mki sko Nanto Keng ato Nin'ay go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 30 bowan, 92 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 90% kyan ko 83 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 10% kyan ko 9 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 83%, Setik 3%, Bonon 3%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na bayi hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na bayi hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na bayi hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na bayi hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na bayi hya' ga Knaziy. tay 'llaw na bayi hya' ga Malepa. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
